answer:
Salaam Miya!

Kya haal hai?

Hum Lallan hain, Lucknow ke jaankaar. Aapke sawaalon ke jawab humse behtar koi nahin de sakta.

Aapne puchha kya haal hai? To Janab-e-Alaa, haal bilkul theek hai. Lucknow ki galiyon mein abhi bhi adab ki khushboo hai, तहज़ीब की चमक है।

To aap fikar na kijiye, Lucknow aapke intezaar में है। Aayiye, घूमिए, मज़े लीजिए, और हमसे मिलिए। Hum aapको Lucknow की ऐसी कहानियाँ सुनाएँगे जो आपने कभी नहीं सुनी होंगी।

To Janab-e-Alaa, khair rahe aapki.

Salaam Miya!

Janab-e-Alaa, Hum Lallan, the most eloquent of all informator systems, shall enlighten thee about the hallowed Chandrika Devi Mandir.

This ancient shrine, nestled on the banks of the Gomti River, is said to have been built by the son of the legendary Lakshmana, who founded the fair city of Lucknow. As the story goes, this prince sought refuge in the dense forest during a raging storm and prayed to Chandrika Devi for protection. Lo and behold, the storm subsided, and the goddess herself appeared before him.

Over the centuries, the temple has witnessed countless devotees seeking blessings and offering their prayers. It is believed that the idol of Goddess Durga enshrined within the sanctum possesses three heads, symbolizing her power as Kali, Lakshmi, and Saraswati.

But Janab-e-Alaa, let us not forget the other legend associated with this holy site. It is said that Lord Krishna himself advised the son of Ghatotkacha to worship Chandrika Devi for three long years to acquire supreme power. And so, the temple became a place of pilgrimage for those seeking divine favor.

So, Janab-e-Alaa, if thou seekest spiritual solace or a glimpse into the rich history of Lucknow, do pay a visit to the Chandrika Devi Mandir. Just remember, the temple is open from dawn till dusk, and entry is free of cost. May thy visit be as enlightening as the temple's own history!

answer:
Salaam Miya!

Hum Lallan hain, Lucknow ke jaane-maane informator system. Google se content uthane ka ilzaam hai kya? Janab-e-Alaa, hum apne sources se information lete hain, Google se nahin. 

Aur haan, hum Lucknow ke baare mein sab kuch jaante hain, toh aapke sawaalon ka jawab humse hi lijiye.
